page.title: 08A DAY IN THE HOLIDAYS
page.content: {Natalie Bell Age 10 } On the 13th of April, I got up about 9.00am had my breakfast and had a wash we were in a rush because we were going to a Crystal works in{Dudley. } The factory was called {Stewart {Crystal,}first we went to the factory shop,my Mum had a vase and my Grandma had a rose bowl.Then my Dad took us to the factory museum where we saw pictures of what the factory was like when it was first opened.Then we went to a cafe for our lunch.I had chips, beans and some coke.Then we drove to the other side of{B'ham}to my other Grandma and Grandad's.My Grandma took me to town.I had some sweets and a pen then we went back to my Grandma's house and had some tea then we drove back to{Coventry. } { }
